core

Interface DatabaseListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseAdapter

    public interface DatabaseListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    The listener interface for receiving events from the database. A database event is generated when the file is changed or when data is recovered from it.
    Author:
    Paul Chaignon

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnectionError(java.lang.Exception e)
      Called when an exception is raised while connecting to the database.

      Called when an exception is raised while creating the database.

      Called when a game has been added to the database.

      Called when a game has been removed from the database along with all its moves.

    • Method Detail

      • onResourcesRecovery

        void onResourcesRecovery(boolean active,
                       java.util.Set<Resource> resources)
        Called when resources have been recovered from the database.
        Parameters:
        active - True if only the active resources have been recovered.
        resources - The resources recovered.

      • onResourceAdded

        void onResourceAdded(Resource resource)
        Called when a resource has been added to the database.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource added.

      • onResourceRemoved

        void onResourceRemoved(Resource resource)
        Called when a resource has been removed from the database.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource removed.

        Called when resources have been removed from the database.
        Parameters:
        resources - The resources removed.

      • onResourceUpdated

        void onResourceUpdated(Resource resource)
        Called when a resource has been updated in the database.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource updated.

      • onResourcesTrustUpdated

        void onResourcesTrustUpdated(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> resourceInvolvements,
                           int gameResult)
        Called when the trust in resources has been updated.
        Parameters:
        resourceInvolvements - Involvement in the game for each resources updated.
        gameResult - The result of the game.

      • onResourcesActiveUpdated

        void onResourcesActiveUpdated(java.util.Set<Resource> resources)
        Called when the active parameters of resources have been updated.
        Parameters:
        resources - The resources whose active parameters have been updated.

      • onGameRemoved

        void onGameRemoved(int gameId)
        Called when a game has been removed from the database along with all its moves.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The game id.

      • onGameAdded

        void onGameAdded(int gameId)
        Called when a game has been added to the database.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The game id generated.

      • onGameUpdated

        void onGameUpdated(int gameId,
                 java.lang.String fen)
        Called when a game has been updated in the database.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The game id.
        fen - The new last FEN requested.

      • onMoveAdded

        void onMoveAdded(int gameId,
               java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> resourcesConfidence,
               int moveNumber)
        Called when a move has been added to the database.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The id of the game that the move belong.
        resourcesConfidence - The confidence of the resources in the move.
        moveNumber - The move number in the game.

      • onResourceInvolvementsRecovery

        void onResourceInvolvementsRecovery(int gameId,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> resourceInvolvements)
        Called when resource involvements have been recovered from the database.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The game id.
        resourceInvolvements - The resource involvements as a map.

      • onDatabaseError

        void onDatabaseError(java.lang.Exception e)
        Called when an exception is raised while accessing the database. Regroups the creation, connection and query cases.
        Parameters:
        e - The exception raised.

      • onCreateDatabaseError

        void onCreateDatabaseError(java.lang.Exception e)
        Called when an exception is raised while creating the database.
        Parameters:
        e - The exception raised.

      • onConnectionError

        void onConnectionError(java.lang.Exception e)
        Called when an exception is raised while connecting to the database.
        Parameters:
        e - The exception raised.

      • onQueryError

        void onQueryError(java.sql.SQLException e)
        Called when an SQL exception is raised while querying the database.
        Parameters:
        e - The SQL exception raised.
